intent_atoms.description: Implemented a concrete parser for the `hdlr` box in BoxParserRegistry that decodes version, flags, handler_type, normalized handler categories, and UTF-8 handler names using FullBoxReader.
Provide human-friendly handler category display by introducing a reusable HandlerType model to classify common four-character codes such as vide, soun, mdir.
Ensure that handler metadata propagates from the streaming pipeline into JSON exports and on-screen annotations via CLI export path and SwiftUI detail flows.
Handler names must be decoded using UTF-8 encoding.

functional_units.name: hdlr handler parser
functional_units.description: Parses 'hdlr' boxes decoding version, flags, handler_type, normalizes categories and UTF-8 names using FullBoxReader

functional_units.name: HandlerType model
functional_units.description: Classifies common handler four-character codes into human-friendly categories for downstream exports

functional_units.name: CLI export path extension
functional_units.description: Extends CLI to include handler metadata in JSON exports

functional_units.name: SwiftUI detail flow update
functional_units.description: Displays handler metadata on-screen annotations in SwiftUI views

functional_units.name: Regression tests for handler metadata propagation
functional_units.description: Ensures handler data flows from streaming pipeline into JSON and UI
